pkgmetadata.longdescription: # anfema-django-utilsCollection of various django related utilities, helpers & small apps.https://anfema.github.io/anfema-django-utils/## DocumentationTo build the documentation from the local sources run: ```bash$ pip install tox && tox -e docs```## TestsTo run the unittests from the local sources run: ```bash$ pip install tox && tox```## Release processSteps required to create a new release and publish the package on PyPI: 1. Bump `__version__` in `anfema_django_utils/__ini__.py`2. Create a new release on GitHub with the tag `v<version>`
